4sX26eqUbyWeqP1x8yR2eQ.text: This is my favorite new place. Read the menu carefully - this place has a lot to offer. Grilled blacked catfish, fried catfish basket, and Jambalaya are my favorite so far. I will be trying the salmon and fried okra next time.

wpdskWyiAC0X7tJOsywEYQ.text: Ordered the catfish po boy. It was ok but nothing special. It didn't have any flavor I thought. I've eaten po boy sandwiches before that have had flavor. Tried a bite of the gumbo someone else in my group ordered & wow was it spicy! Make sure to have a large glass of water handy. Nice large space that was clean. Not sure if I'll go back.

iqXSTgwt7WQQOzJm-6n8ZA.text: Very friendly staff. Very light food when you pick from the grilled menu. Love this place, very spacious and very clean. I recommend if you like seafood. Try the veracruz sauce!

Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Mahi Mahi

boXZ_2I0BfxTls7VxU6EOg.text: First time here...had the fried catfish and 4 shrimp basket combo. I ordered the "spicy" option which really wasn't spicy...to me at least, and was not a big fan of the breading on the protein. I gave it three stars for the plate I had. Will need to come back and try something else next time! The service was great and staff was super friendly!

KW6i9fWIf_Wxtp_CkTO7TA.text: I got fish and chips and it was crispy and fish was very good and their shoestring fries. Their hush puppies are to die for

DMZ1h8DjDi9YiLQCxsuwWw.text: This is Definitely a hidden spot ! I got the cat fish and the bbq shrimp. The shrimp wasn't the peel ones that I liked and they were small ! My friend got the salmon salad which was sever in a huge silver bowl and it was full she said it was delicious! There home made strawberry lemonade is also so yummy !! I will return

3blMA1zrH4BW3W_TmHeexg.text: My favorite seafood restaurant ever!!! Everything is always so good. Owners and staff are wonderful. Last night my husband ate their burger. He claims it's the best burger ever as well!!! Closed on Sunday's, so don't try to go after church

PKshuneZCMJ1TQzP4Gf75Q.text: Excellent food and excellent service. The folks are super nice and very attentive. So far we've tried the fried shrimp, gumbo, grits, hush puppies, fried chicken strip and banana pudding. Every one of the items was exceptional down to the ranch and tartar sauce. Portions are fair. I like this place better than Lola's. Make sure to bring cash to tip the counter, you don't have an option for the card.

QHj87IYdBer9qBzWUOKOVA.text: Wonderful freshly made soups. All the dishes are made to order. Very helpful friendly service too! Casual atmosphere and an ecellent value!

lJ6_PR0h9EI22ftR55F_Iw.text: This has become my go to fish place. It's just down the street. More than that, the staff is friendly the place is well lit and clean and it's roomy. I have yet to have a bad meal here. I've tried their po'boys, chowders and catfish plates. All are top notch. I'm hooked on the crawfish chowder. I have a bowl every time I stop by whether I'm dining in or taking to go.

8eQriOPB7caiFy0A-CspaA.text: I am a fan of any place that can produce a full meal in 8 minutes or less! I stop at Fish King Grill for lunch like once a week. Normally I get the salmon platter, with garlic and butter. But today I tried the catfish with blackened seasoning. I promise you I wish I would of ordered two meals. The catfish was cooked perfectly, not too dry and beautiful color. I opted for double veggies, which makes my meal a little healthier. The flavor of this entire meal deserves a separate review, it was so good. From here on out I'll always be getting the blackened seasoning on all of the selections. Great option to put the seasoning on any of your dishes, including the grilled veggies.

K6gdY8u0L18oCPuzbA2hYA.text: This was my first time, i had the bbq grilled shrimp with zucchini and green beans with a side of steamed spinach, also a crawfish chowder.. let's just say it this is a hit!!! i will be back every time i come to vegas from now on!!!

ZBghU7-VQpQSi7hTe9vgAw.text: Food was very good! I had the blackened sea bass with rice and beans and grilled veggies. I wanted something light after a long night of drinking. This place is a great find, I will definitely be back next time I come to Vegas.

xwEIb86PnW4sCjOG929WTQ.text: The Mahi-Mahi plate was made to perfection! They carefully placed all the right ingredients to make a perfect seafood platter that will suffice for lunch or dinner!

gyF3bCIMVJqrQPWLqkdF4g.text: Just delicious!! I almost fill up my punch card with 8 visits and every time I have ordered something different and every time has been delicious highly recommended.

4-ihrNQGLSUyvAc0qMeCTg.text: I apologize for not reviewing this place 6 months ago. I have been there over 25 times and they have failed to dissapoint. They have 6 or 7 different fish that can be grilled on top of a salad or with side dishes.  The fish is always perfectly cooked.  There are 4 ways u can get the grilled fish. All 4 are delicious, esp. The Verracruz.  Nobody does a better job with fried fish! The bayou platter rules.  There chowder is top notch as well.  Tgey even do beer right.  A frozen 18 oz. Mug of Sam Adam's for just $4.75. Great desserts as well.  The owner is the True American success story.  From Mexico, he started 30 years ago as a dishwasher.  His two sons work at the counter.  One of them says "man" a whole lot. My only complaint t about this place is the buzzer they give u to Know your order is ready . Could give one a stroke@ The best part of FKG might be the price!! It would cost you more to buy decent fish that you would have to cook yourself.  Between $10-16 for a beautiful filet.  The orange roughy is great!

G1GtKelpIa_4THg5FOvUfA.text: We've passed by Fish King Grill several times but never stopped. Today we did and I am so happy we did. We started off with the fried calamari, it was very good, great taste & lightly battered. I had the shrimp poor boy & it was great. My husband had the fried oysters which he said was great. We will be going back!

yhbSo-61i14-0LTBX2xBRw.text: Clean and spacious area for quick and delicious seafood.  Had the jumbalaya and it was full of meat and shrimp.  The bread added to it nicely.  I wanted a little more spice and each table had an assortment of Tabasco and other hot sauces to add in.  Delicious!  Staff was attentive and seemed to have a good vibe about the place.  Worth checking out!

XSchUL3XFxbLS4IFwmROAw.text: I'm very picky about catfish so for me to say that there catfish is good it has to be very good. I usually get the spicy version.  their sides are pretty good and the portions are big so they're great for sharing.

ZLfusOjO_0alFgODs-zg-w.text: Hidden gem! My wife and I ordered orange roughy and a spicey shrimp pasta. Both dishes were phenomenal, the fish (blackened) was flaky with a mild spice. The sides though were equally delicious, even the toast was masterfully cooked. The shrimp were were a perfect C shape not over cooked with a mildly spicey cream sauce. New fish king grill fans!

uLadr-AcOqQ5gtcwml1B5w.text: I had some great catfish tacos. The red beans and rice were great. My wife enjoyed her Gumbo. Pretty friendly staff.

xsgh7FN8EGaliRduDZL_Yg.text: Definitely a pleasant surprise.  We ordered the Poor Boys, fish tacos and grilled snapper.  AWESOME!!! Place was a little slow so i digest we spread the word and pump some business for this family owned restaurant.  Can't wait to go back

iaI9748JLn3AqopqMKODFQ.text: They know what they are doing. Everyone who came in while I was there let them know how happy they were with their food. No shortcuts here. I had the soft-shell crab po' boy and it was delicious, as well as filling. Even the roll was exceptional. The hush puppies were perfection. I was able to trade the french fries I didn't want for another side and chose coleslaw--also perfection, flavorful, not greasy. I'll have to take half the sandwich home next time as it was too much for me to eat at once (I ate it anyway). I took some clam chowder home as it seemed to be a special that day. Told them not to heat it. The next day I found it to be extremely flavorful, in what I think may be New Orleans style. My only recommendation would be to cut back a bit on the salt, as it's not needed and a lot of people are cutting back. They had grilled sea bass for $17 ( their fish entrees are 8-12 oz), which would cost you twice as much on the strip. Interesting sides. I only wish they were in Anthem. Can't wait to go again.

V3VaoBWWGCGaS9zdbWt0rQ.text: Really friendly service. Fresh and wholesome food. Everything we tried was full of flavor and made to order. Portions were very generous!

fwPpau7HI4odr1TGaNtmIA.text: First time at Fish King Grill.  We had the grilled trout with the garlic butter sauce and the blackened red snapper.  They were both very good.  My wife thought the zucchini was outstanding and the french fries were good too.  It is so nice to have an inexpensive option for fish and the service was outstanding.

BsWkXAZZpdxPmS8zL0ZWjA.text: Again we witnessed them use the microwave in clear view on multiple items.  We are avid foodies and support local businesses as well.  Our regular stops would tell you we are great customers, tip well.  And are supportive of the community.  We tried this new place based on a eater article of new openings. We stand by our comment and rarely return food and expect a refund.  But the food had no flavor,  I subbed potatoes once they informed us table side that the hush puppy batter wasn't usable (which should have been a sign).  Again it's a clean establishment and nothing against the staff there.  But the food was not good and to in open view microwave food does not represent for your establishment well.  But aside from the microwave the actual taste of the food was a issue as well.  The "grits" we presented  as a grit fried cake type thing and lacked flavor. The shrimp and "grits" were not good.  The red snapper also lacked flavor and the potatoes I subbed once informed they couldn't do hush puppies were over buttered/garlic and no real seasoning.   Maybe over time they will improve their menu, or maybe not and just blame customers for their bad food.  Reviews are meant to help a business improve their issues or highlight good things so it gives them a guide of good and bad. I hope this additional information helps other customers in the future.

nMHBv-wTztxlvlZtTGMdPg.text: The food here is amazing!   I substituted the fish tacos for shrimp..... excellent!  The salmon & ceviche are also delicious. If you order a beer they give you an cold frosty goblet.  The family who owns this restaurant takes great pride in customer service, quality of food and cleanliness. This is our new favorite place to eat!!

jVTh4g4lgu75iRUsq-x_HQ.text: First time following recommendations from Yelp for a restaurant. This place is 5 minutes from me and had to try it. Quick service, very nice staff, place was clean, but the food got me. Living here in Vegas, you can be overwhelmed by the food choices, gotten tired of Buffet food already (been here a little over a year). I have been wanting to find a spot that has good fried catfish and large portions for the cost!!! I'm done. I'm from back east and am very picky about how folks cook catfish. I am impressed. New favorite spot for my wife and I.

ezm1qskRlpDnqkfYnJnVzQ.text: Very clean!!! Food has great taste also!!!!! I was driving looking for something to eat after the gym and it was perfect that I drove by!!!! They cater to the folks that want that fried and grilled vibe!!!

iowRn9qaSYfEOmuPtATvlQ.text: Well, after my 5 star review I have to post this addendum. I was there for lunch today and "thought" I had ordered the spicy fried shrimp for myself and my sister. I wasn't quite sure I got my order correct but the girl on the register said she "knew what I wanted."  I like the fried shrimp, fires and corn and that's what I've had before (along with the sea bass).  What I got was quite a bit different...there were 6 small shrimp curled up on a plate, heavily seasoned, and with zucchini (yuck!) and some sort of bean and rice mixture and scallions.  When I asked the girl about it she said, "That's how they come and the NEXT time you can ask for substitutes."  I ate the shrimp (WAY too hot" for seasoning) and scraped the zucchini and most of the rice and beans off on to a napkin on the tray.  The best part of my lunch was the strawberry lemonade and cup of clam chowder, otherwise this was a ONE STAR review. .  My sister wasn't too pleased with her shrimp that were far to spicy for her, too.  I had ordered "bar-b-que" flavor shrimp for her and I think she got the same thing I did...probably "blackened" with Cajun spices.  She took most of hers home but I'd be surprised if she'll eat them.   Not too pleased at spending nearly $40 for this. I'll have to think about this some more before I decide to try Fish King Grill again.

F9l-uddde6qv1OdQZHWxaA.text: Very excited to have a place like this in my area. It's informal but very clean and friendly people. The food is delicious and  reasonable prices. I loved the Crawfish chowder is delicious  .The grilled tilapia tacos were very good and fresh. Definitely will be back to try other dishes

t2GV4p4WCWXqaCu7H_cnfA.text: Excellent hard shell catfish tacos. Casual which I like, with many different seafood options . I will definitely recommend to friends !

QwRVdt1CZCwMc9Gz25pzHw.text: Delicious.  I had the grilled shrimp salad and the hubs had the shrimp and chicken basket.  Best hushpuppies we have ever had.

C4bGZqCmFWgH16msNtGBMg.text: We went this past Friday night on a recommendation from friends. We liked it so much we went back Saturday night. The catfish,gumbos & chowder are great. The hush puppies are the best we've ever had,I had the Lafayette burger Saturday night and much to my surprise it was also excellent. And to help wash it down the tap beers in the frozen glasses for under $5 are a definite plus. One small reason I held back the 5th star,no big deal but the over anxious young man next to the guy at the cash register needs to tone it down a notch or two,consistently interrupts the other people while talking or getting information about the menu. But I highly recommend this place and I have a strong feeling there will be lines out the door soon enough. 2nd review:  Sometimes restaurants in Vegas open with a bang,then things change, usually for the worse. Not this joint. They improve and get better every time,and we've been here over 30 times. Family owned and operated and that shows from the enthusiast,helpful and friendly young men who work the counter to their father Miguel who is a PRO!

6Lu_rS3slvNIP_kwA4MpQA.text: This place is a hidden gem! Great meal options and the food is delicious! I had the shrimp poor boy sandwich. It was delicious!! We also had the wild hog peppers! Amazing! Hit the spot!! Try also the chowder, it's delicious!!

y_BKAvHeftcwft_MT6gVUw.text: First visit for us and I highly recommend the Vrricruz sauces on your choice of foods fillets. Bit of heat on it, just right though. Excellent food. We'll be back alot.

-VEMaI35pA8Uwgww4vZCCw.text: I happened to be staying nearby and thought I would try Fish King Grill based on the reviews. I was not disappointed. I ordered calamari for an appetizer and the grilled tilapia fish tacos.  Both were delicious.  The calamari was served quickly and was piping hot. The tacos were seasoned just right with a great tasting slaw/salsa.  Servings were generous. The staff was friendly and welcoming. Very good value for such fresh food.

BwTsniZ-gyAITT90jTG5JQ.text: My husband saw this restaurant pop up on yelp and we decided to give it a try. After taking a look at the menu, we saw many tasty-sounding things that we wanted to try! I had my heart set on the Orange Roughy Salad and he wanted to try the Orange Roughy/Red Snapper combo platter. When we walked in, we were immediately greeted by smiling faces and welcoming staff. The gentleman at the register answered all our questions about what the fish is grilled with and what were in the different seasonings/sauces you can choose. I still had my heart set on the Orange Roughy, but I was told that they had "run out" of Orange Roughy. I was mortified. This was literally the only thing I wanted to try today but they were all out. I don't understand how a brand new restaurant that just opened doesn't even have something that is offered on their menu. Since my husband also wanted Orange Roughy, he couldn't order either. We were both very disappointed to say the very least. We drove across town for nothing. 1 star for not even being able to try the restaurant since they didn't have what we wanted, so we just walked out leaving hungry and disappointed. We want to try the restaurant still, but will probably call to make sure they have the fish we want before coming. Kinda inconvenient.

x0k7q70k9efsh4s_L_AT_g.text: Super friendly staff that appreciates their customers.  Fish was served with beans and rice. Great beer selection that is in line with their food.

AOhiQ_gwjxqeTMR_h29sEw.text: The seafood was delicious and the portions generous!  My husband ordered a pound of shrimp and couldn't eat the whole platter.  I had two catfish fillets. Wow, filling!  Highly recommend.  We'll be back!  Our dining neighbors ordered a whole tilapia each, thinking they would be small.  Absolutely huge.  Good laugh over that but it looked delicious as well.

CVYP8sQlrjkwmom1gOFAGw.text: Best lunch spot for seafood ... I come here often   The fish is always fresh and service is great ... it may not be fancy but that's  part of the appeal

vyT_oH2BjoU0aeplv7A3Jw.text: We had crawfish tail poor boys. The sandwich was good. The crawfish tails were very very small. Love the strawberry lemonade

LPdjy_Sy0wgww2RJ0qYRSA.text: Visited Fish King Grill on this Saturday (10/13/18) for lunch. Food was amazing and the staff is really nice. Wished we tried this place earlier because I can no longer eat here due to doing the keto diet for health reasons.

Oyt0-KchxQELluo0WrPGRg.text: Yum! My husband loves the fried fish, but the grilled is better (and healthier), and the gumbo is to die for! This place is in our neighborhood, and we are thrilled to have it nearby.

uQhcYBUpsasvyfENHR_X8Q.text: Great food, great service, and great prices in a casual setting. Even some Southern charm in Vegas!  My husband and I dined in on a Friday evening. As soon as we arrived we were warmly greeted. Being a newer restaurant the employees were more than willing to answer menu questions and make recommendations. The employees continued to be very friendly and accommodating while we dined.   The menu offers so many great options, ranging from grilled fish plates to southern favorites to po'boys to salads to fried seafood. Pricing is very reasonable for the quality and quantity of entrees.   My husband and I started by splitting the Wild Hog Poppers which were amazing. Can you really go wrong with cheese, jalapeno, and bacon? The size of this appetizer was generous. I ordered the Snow Crab Leg Platter and was impressed. The crab legs were well prepared and delicious. I also ordered a side of Red Beans & Rice that I enjoyed. It wasn't as spicy as I expected, but the flavors were great. My husband went with a Catfish Poor Boy and loved it. This was enough to ensure a return visit for him. The fries and hushpuppies served alongside were great as well.

ywboHl8BPO7XVgSln25ZUg.text: The catfish was good.... the gumbo was okay. For people who know gumbo suppose to have lots broth ... very little noted with big chunk of git in middle. They use cheap ketchup on table. It was okay. Will not be returning. If they had great deal on catfish then maybe .....

SdfNXcit-h8P4re7Dx_Z_g.text: Tough butterfly shrimp. Overcooked and no flavor on regular.  We only ate a few.   Chowder was ok, mostly tastes of celery.  Fried fish & chips was ok.  Tartar sauce wAs good.  Overpriced below par food.

Qu4IIFc_anAluuiWWhdPOQ.text: The best fish off the strip! The restaurant is clean and inviting. Never a soggy hush puppy!

R2b0_NC2nYf0VkN0SsIYGA.text: Very flavorful! We had the Gumbo, Sea Bass Veracruz and the blackened catfish.  Delicious! All of it.

FEgQHiisWSgL_KWo65EctA.text: Wow this was super delicious! Service was quick. I got my food to go so I didn't take pictures. I got the seafood gumbo and Jambalaya because I wanted to compare the dishes and decide which one I liked more, however I love them both so I can't decide! It had great flavor spices but not too spicy. Both came with rice in the rice was delicious in the gumbo and jambalaya. I also have to highly recommend the hush puppies. Best hush puppies I've ever had. Do yourself a favor and get a side of chipotle mayo for your hush puppies. I will definitely be coming back and look forward to trying many more things on the menu! Thank goodness this place is just down the street from my house!

DxnK1OIV18qsmNAnIUMMrw.text: I love this place, I had the ceviche today and it did NOT disappoint  chunky and not chopped up was so welcomed

7gfGZ18mGsHHObiTYMJwcQ.text: I just happened to see their "Now Open" sign, so I detoured and grabbed lunch from this new seafood spot. With no lunch specials and no grand opening specials, it was more than I usually like to spend for lunch, but it was worth it in the end.  I'm trying to eat more healthy these days. I went with a grilled salmon salad. Because I got it to go, they put the fish in a separate container. A little wasteful yes, but that helped keep the fish warm and the salad fresh.  For a simple dish, I enjoyed it more than I expected. The salmon was grilled perfectly with a slight char but still tender and juicy. The salad was nice and crispy; it may have helped that I asked for the dressing on the side.  The restaurant is spacious with ample tables and nice decor. I really should just eat in next time, but I have a habit of always taking things to go. The employees were welcoming and friendly.  Overall, just an enjoyable lunch and a welcome addition to the work vicinity.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Salmon Salad

ZLpUJhAAORONzttf21fKgg.text: Ok this place is a diamond in the rough. Drove by one night and bookmarked it to check out on another night. Went in for dinner and was so glad we tried it.   Ordered the crawfish chowder, blackened catfish plate, and combo basket of shrimp and catfish.   Crawfish chowder-super creamy and loaded with crawfish, potatoes, and celery. Very tasty and had a little spicy kick to it.   Blackened catfish plate-nice piece of fish cooked perfectly. Served with grilled veggies and red beans and rice. Everything on the plate was cooked to perfection and tasty.   Catfish and shrimp basket-nicely breaded and crunchy. Fish and shrimp were moist and the fries and hush puppies were crispy.   Service was quick and casual but cashiers were friendly and knowledgeable. The place was kind of crowded too so it seems like word is getting out on how good this place is.   We were tempted to order something else off of the menu just because the food was so good and everything on the menu sounded good. But we were stuffed so we will just wait until our next visit and try something different. Nice addition to the neighborhood.

eSXs41Ofz1sLMhlRByK2VQ.text: Only downside. If you have a hankering for jambalaya or red beans and rice on sunday, you are out of luck at this comfort food establishment.

68F8k15Mn7j3t6F-n2E35Q.text: This place is amazing... If you have not tried it yet you should! I lived in Louisiana for several years and this really was True Louisiana style cooking! I felt like I was at my friends house having dinner,  the food was so authentic and delicious!  We had a little bit of everything! Fried shrimp, grilled shrimp, fried catfish and some jalapeno poppers! Delicious

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jrA4kBN0_qjfqKruWGQs7Q.text: Great seafood spot. Loved the fried shrimp and oyster basket & Mexican shrimp cocktail. Clean restaurant, and great food. Will be a regular to this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ArdJ-JhnLepATimZ-Lsztw.text: Good food!! Good service.... I would come back here again...... I would try all their grilled platter.

WAlcXGUy7SHikoepZuv8jQ.text: I love the food in New Orleans, so I was looking forward to trying this place out. The staff was very friendly, and great with answering any questions. I ordered a lot of food, but I wanted to try a lot  of items. I had the Crawfish Chowder, Red Beans and Rice, Jambalaya, and some free Hush Puppies for checking in on Yelp. The crawfish chowder was good, with a bit of a black pepper kick, which I liked. I'd probably enjoy eating this more when it isn't 110 degrees outside....haha. The red beans and rice was ok, but I was a little disappointed. I love red beans and rice, so I supposed I expected too much. The jambalaya was good, but I was hoping it would be a little better. It was quite tasty, though. The hush puppies were really good. I don't think I was expecting them to be as good as they were. I liked the food, but if you're looking for something comparable to food in New Orleans, I don't think this is the place. It would be better to come here without those expectations. I did enjoy my experience, and I did enjoy the food. If I'm ever in this part of town, I wouldn't have a problem stopping by again.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Red Beans and Rice, Crawfish Chowder, Jambalaya, and Hush Puppies.

ENy-nxD0a3CcPh352Hvf8A.text: I love this place   I stopped by for an early dinner and been the type of person that enjoys to try new places and formerly an ex cook at a very young age, also  attended the Orange County Culinary School while  back but never pursued my dream of been a chef.  I asked for the chef's Mike recommendation and tried the Orange Roughy with garlic butter with rice and zucchini (healthy and delicious) fish was flaky and delicious not over cooked or dry, jasmine rice is the perfect companion, then another suggestion from manager Lorena the Louisiana basket worth the calories .    Tasty food, great service and good prices

_qCpjF1C4pOIpWN3vd-g_A.text: First time here.  I like the menu.  It's bright and clean. They have fountain drinks and bottled beer.  Kind of a beachy, boaty vibe. The just added clam chowder to the menu and have daily specials. The tables come loaded with a variety of hot sauces. Today's special is grilled sea bass and it looks yummy!  The calimari is to die for!  They seem to do a good take out business as several people came in and picked up orders while I was there.  If you're looking for good sea food, fast service at a reasonable price give them a try.  Allen was my server and was very helpful and polite.

KlUybPeIeubh-BhRNoYEAw.text: Wonderful service and great food.  The gumbo and grits are delicious as well as the ceviche.

Llvt_9dAuTOlKCmnoyrjcQ.text: The food was amazing! Gumbo and crawfish chowder were both so delicious. Bread was fresh on the oyster poor boy sandwich and the breading on the oysters were on point.  Also had the fish & chips and they were fantastic! Everyone was super friendly and helpful. Prices  were great. Could not be happier with our experience!

E3LT0x16pTs1OfWPo5p1ug.text: This fast casual restaurant with a fun beachy atmosphere has good Cajun and seafood favorites. Menu includes everything you'd expect in a Cajun place, plus Mexican shrimp cocktail and hamburgers. BBQ Shrimp is spicy and delicious. Enjoy an adult beverage to cut the spicy. Even though you order at the counter, the staff is kind and attentive.

_lKKVXwOfBgABgCRf4S8gw.text: Just visited king fish grill for lunch, for the first time. The food met my expectations after reviewing their menu online. We had gumbo seafood chowder and the mahi-mahi poor boy.  The one and only complaint that we had; is that the gumbo and the seafood chowder were very spicy (to spicy really).  The flavor of everything else was really amazing and I love everything that they did with the Decor of a restaurant in a strip center.  Also, I would like to note that menu pricing was very reasonable for quality food. I will visit again and again but I may not have the chowder or gumbo (spicy level to high) but there are other things to enjoy on the menu and I look forward to my next visit.

nxew0KmBvX4fe5jrCtn5lw.text: The jambalaya and gumbo are great! Best I have had in Vegas. The fried items are not my cup of tea as they use a cornmeal and we don't really fry like that in New Orleans (born and raised) but at least they weren't overcooked. Local business so definitely a plus. Their strawberry lemonade is pretty good too.

xMTb_Y1Uu6lwlTDmAG-vGQ.text: Great food! Great service! I will be back to try more items from the menu. I ordered the fried oyster po'boy sandwich combo and a cup of gumbo.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried Oyster Po&#39;boy &#34;fully dressed&#34; with fries and hush puppies.

ldPm9rpbdUiFADtr9MPMIQ.text: This place is great, I've had salmon, orange roughy, and shrimp kabob plates so far, and they were all perfect. The service is great, everyone has a nice attitude and are pretty helpful if you need any suggestions. The place is clean, quiet, and a very chill atmosphere. This is a great place for a nice, healthy, casual meal that isnt too expensive.

J67vdSxdZMcdGqpGmn8BGg.text: Delicious! Found this gem in yelp, we see staying at a resort down the street and wanted dinner. We were pleasantly surprised. Customer service was spot on and food was delicious. I'm from the south so I know what a good hush puppy is; this place rocked it! I had the grilled fish tacos (easily shareable between two people) and they were delicious. The perfect blend of flavors. They come in a hard shell taco and served with rice and beans. We will definitely be back next time we are in town.

KPu7MLneUzSe73jW15reVQ.text: My lady was hungry for crab legs, and a trip to the "real" Joe's Crabs" at Caesars with its luxury tax price tag was too excessive for mid-week dining and the chain "Joe's Crab Shack" is simple awful, so we checked Yelp and found Fish King Grill!   They didn't have King Crab, but Snow Crab legs were amazing, perfectly done, ample portions and reasonably priced.  I had the grilled shrimp kabobs with home-made Cole slaw and hush puppies, also excellent.  This local neighborhood diner is worth a try.  Staff was very helpful and the dining area was immaculate.

warI1Zh11XQXeDGZqQysLA.text: You cannot go wrong with the Fish Tacos.  Fried Ocra is awesome.  Very quiet and very Southern.  They also serve beer, wine, and other drinks.  The staff is friendly and professional.  Very clean!

fOctBHcfHANRN2dlTl-8VQ.text: We are here on a getaway and wanted a local place to eat, not a chain.  Very very good.  The fried shrimp, oysters and hush puppies were delicious. Cornmeal is the southern way to fry seafood up, and this was on the mark. Too bad they aren't in our area, we'd eat here all the time!

4q5u4fuFZ0u5m39lFKCeTA.text: This is our first check in here-- but we've been here four times. Foods always excellent and hot !! Make sure you check in..2 free hushpuppies !! Also do internet search for a fish King Grill coupon they have a two for one fish and chips.

j7yE8eot_m79P0uKsTuC5A.text: Second time here. Catfish & trout are superb. Fried calamari was another hit. Service was on point& very polite!  Love the subtle Cajun atmosphere!  Will definitely be coming back for more!

1PxVRRRcXo6txSmR59a6QQ.text: Hands down...this restaurant is EVERYTHING! Service is phenomenal, Food is DELICIOUS and warm atmosphere. Wonderful gem in Vegas.

bg6mRzIKKs3hTqFpG25r9Q.text: Very clean and no fishy smell. We shared catfish, fries, shrimp and cevichi. All was prety good. The service is friendly and food came very quick. Wish the cevichi was cut smaller.

ncxZBVbhJzD7fbpSZ9t2Og.text: Their hours are 11am-3pm on Sunday. We were craving seafood for our late lunch and rushed over to be met with a locked door at 2:40pm. The owner and employees were inside but no one acknowledged us to even apologize and advise why they were closing early. Very bad customer service.

ShFpN9CuDdTaNes9fgqFbg.text: So I'm a city boy and not a big fried catfish fan. Until now!! I just had a killer catfish/shrimp basket complete with hush puppies   (Not sure what hush puppies are) but it was awesome

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

M9cxjWmnvnfMRGnnN5GcqA.text: Very good, especially for the price. I like my gumbo thick with lots of seafood and I like my crab where it's fresh enough to crack open and most of the meat just slides out. I was not disappointed.

ew_BBiJOCcTVYvDGn1Qq0w.text: When your seafood soul needs nourishing this mom and pop seafood joint is your new answer. Fresh, delicious, unpretentious seafood in heart warming portions. The shack style order counter service was a welcomed casual environment to enjoy such surprisingly high quality seafood!  We had the grilled fish platters, orange roughy and sea bass, in blackened and garlic butter. Not only was the fish delicious and huge but the beans and veggie sides were also on point and presented handsomely. This is undoubtedly my new spot to satisfy my seafood itch.

ofvV6LWKkSnzK0T48-e4UQ.text: Nothing but high praise. We will be back many times to come. The food was perfect, so was the crawfish chowder and the red snapper.

VH20e5_1Vg7HIAqxcWJVvg.text: This is a good place. However, you must understand. This is Vegas/Henderson and fresh seafood is not readily available. Their food here appears to be pre-breaded and frozen. You place an order and they pull the food out of the freezer and drop into the fryer.  The selection is large and the quality is good. If you like seafood, this is the place for you. I loved their hushpuppies. Nice and oniony flavor.  My biggest disappointment is bottled dressing. Yech. How hard is it to make fresh dressing?  Give them a try. They are worth the money. Fast, friendly and good food. How much else can you ask for?

XW8_8EfW4EnN1q1aG2R1XA.text: Saw this place right behind the Bachi Burger and it looked like a nice casual place to get some down home seafood. Went in for a weekday lunch with the wife and we were really pleasantly surprised!  I had the half po' boy with fried shrimp and a cup of crawdad chowder. The sandwich was excellent! Sturdy but soft bread, perfectly fried butterfly shrimp in a cornmeal based dredge, fresh, crisp veggies, and sauced just right. The chowder was the star for me, deep rich seafood flavor, a decent amount of crawfish meat, loaded with potatoes, celery and onion in a rich creamy base with just enough heat to make my mouth tingle. Their hush puppies are light and crispy and delightful, the first time my wife has ever really loved a hush puppy. Really addictively great.   Wife had the soup and salad combo, she got shrimp jambalaya which was rich and thick with a deep, dark roux flavor and smoky notes from sausage and chicken. Salad was fresh and crisp, no complaint.  Lunch for 2 for around 20$. We will be back soon!!!

-d5otpCLLxvr1Qi5gQ69pQ.text: I've seen this place a million times and I finally got to check it out. Very good first impression! Fresh, delicious and very friendly staff! Definitely coming back here for more !

wFfmfp4zjsrWANgjzg2-Og.text: My Fiance and I went here for the first time the other day and were very pleased. The fact that they offer healthy items will be what brings us back. Don't get me wrong we love the fried foods but some days we prefer to eat clean. The quality of food gets an A+ from us. I was craving anything fried (since I'm 38 weeks pregnant) so I got the combo basket of shrimp, catfish, hush puppies, and French fries and it was soooo good! My fiance stuck to the healthier side and ordered the grilled orange roughy, zucchini/squash/, and red potatoes. He loved it! We are very happy to have a seafood restaurant close by. We will be back!

nUbcsz4i-HNM1fed8x2Gzw.text: Fried crawfish poor boy and crawfish chowder were fantastic.  Being from Texas, I know crawfish- and this definitely passed the test!   Friendly staff!  Highly recommend

r_GAw092RKRpsbmNZZTQgQ.text: I just had lunch here with my husband and a friend from Atlanta. He had jambalaya, I had the grilled catfish and our friend had the grilled shrimp kabobs. The food was absolutely delicious! The grilled catfish melted in my mouth. I will dream about it tonight! This restaurant is family owned and operated. They are so sweet and friendly! This is a True gem in this part of Las Vegas. If you haven't tried it yet it is a must! We will be back again and again and again.

XfrVdfjjFEiG6j7QbToS3g.text: The food here is authentic and delicious made with a Louisiana flair! My family had the grilled blackened sea bass, shrimp po'boy, fried catfish po'boy, grilled garlic and butter catfish, jambalaya, and the grits and gumbo. All were so tasty! The hushpuppies were perfect, crispy and sweet. The place is clean and well tended to and the service was on spot. Next time Im bringing the parents and in-laws!

ODiqWstDdJRlVdClX8Q2rw.text: This is my favorite restaurant in the valley. Everything on the menu taste heavenly. Try it, you'll like it!

o-DH3Gs2TKppUMH4hkumZw.text: I try to eat this atleast once a week and I've tried just about everything on the menu. Some of the BEST catfish around and if you eat out as much as myself you know that there is some baddd catfish out there! But their gumbo and jambalaya is just the right spiciness for me atleast. They have quite an assortment of different beers and alcoholic beverages. The people that work there are about the friendliest around... I would definitely recommend trying this place atleast once or once a week like me.                                      Maxx Best

iQ_FqAxr7Jq8ZTiwtUMyWw.text: We love this place my family loves it. We come at least once a week. Great service, great food,and great deserts,

HBgHvggGVu3N-MZj9kuePA.text: This place is kinda amazing. Clean and inviting. Everyone including the staff are all smiling and happy. Fresh food! Tons of options. I found my new spot for great seafood here in Las vegas.  Thank you!!!!

Bm8MK0-PBhsBguNKKPVZ8Q.text: Very nice experience. The owner greeted me and was very pleasant. He spoke to me in personable tones and helped me with my selection.  I ordered the six jumbo shrimp basket and the crawfish chowder bowl. They were both very delicious. The shrimp was battered in a tempura/corn meal which was different to me, but enjoyable. The sauces were tasty too where the cocktail sauce was bright and flavorful and the tartar sauce had just the right tartness. The hush puppies were the best I have ever had. Very light and fluffy with a proper tang.  The bowl of crawfish chowder was very yummy! It had plenty of goodies in the soup yet not so much that you thought you weren't having soup. Just right.  The place settings had plenty of crackers, and condiments. I highly recommend this place!

jBtjTVqsz9H6TDQuYFWFKg.text: Hidden gem!!  GREAT fish at a reasonable price.  BEST orange roughy I have EVER had.  Liked the Mexican style shrimp cocktail too.  The crabs legs tasted GREAT . . .wish the crabs were a bit bigger though as you really had to work for the meat.  The only surprise was how casual this place is.  You place your order and when it is ready you pick it up and take it back to your table.  But this is not going to keep us from coming back for sure.  See you soon Fish King Grill!

IiBz24WCoLyeLg-8ubML6g.text: I can't give 5 stars until I try the rest of the menu. But as a first timer...DELISH! Nice people, good vibe. I will be back soon. The hush puppies were perfectly ligh and fluffy an flavorful. The mixed po boy was so good. We also had the Louisiana basket (oysters, shrimp, catfish,and softshell crab)and fries. I couldn't get 1/2 way through it. But it was all really good. Next visit I will go grilled.

LjUsjL3ZQ7Cjz_Lt_sqNvQ.text: This place is excellent.  They have grilled fish, fried, and steamed, along with all the Cajun-type dishes.  It was very tasty, not fishy at all, and the workers aim to please.  It is very casual.  You order at the counter and they give you an electronic device to let you know when your food is ready so you return to the counter to bring back to your table.  The price is very affordable, about a $$.  We will be back, for sure.

JaPMhNxWlnjBuYFJKsHDYQ.text: Ate there 5-times, to-go 3-times ! The best Shrimp, Fried Catfish Po' Boy sandwiches ! First time I tried the Crawfish chowder - simply delicious !  Will return as often as possible ! Definitely referring it to friends, relatives & visitors !

ndBW2vzFtZtjxHgZhmmWgA.text: My sister and I are not big fish eaters. We went because our friends were raving about it. We got the Poor Boy-shrimp. Let me say, the fish was fresh, it was flavorful and just down right delicious. If you want something new and different that revolves around fish, eat at the Fish King Grill. You won't regret it

Ad8JGC0cOZzVjf1UvZZTdQ.text: Another great meal here. Service great food great. Price great. Great owner. Been co.ing here since a month after it opened and have never had a bad meal

E0mNRR9HHZRkgM6MN-TrXA.text: They clam chowder is always amazing. The portions of fried catfish is huge. The po boys are so bomb. You have to try this place!

ltKupElvu4mXZZMtcv7-AQ.text: I love all fish.  This restaurant knows how to cook fish.  Wish I had gone in sooner on my trip to Vegas.  If you like fish and seafood and don't want to pay for the 'fancy smancyness' the restaurants on the strip charge.  This is the place for you.  Check it out.   The fried catfish, oysters and shrimp were perfectly done.

FcWWOQkXyZ_G_667IyDrQA.text: We had gone here on a friends recommendation and it was amazing. We tried the blackened catfish, the gumbo and clam chowder all of which were very good. The catfish was very fresh and so yummy  along with the grilled squash. Service was quick with great customer service. Will definitely be back to try more.

zTTA99bnFUGAwqW1aSRa5w.text: I came here with a friend to use a coupon that had arrived in the mail at home. The interior is fairly spacious and the format of this fast casual establishment is order at the registers, then wait for your food,  As the name implies, they specialize in seafood at Fish King Grill. I ordered a tasty gumbo, and saw some other patrons enjoying a seafood boil.   Prices were fair, and there is not much table service since it is fast casual style.  I wouldn't mind returning to try more off of their extensive menu.

nYEU9e-Win7xho3u_xWt_g.text: Amazing customer service! Seriously, the nicest restaurant staff I've ever met. Food was amazing: fresh, prepared quickly, great value.  I will definitely be back.

-_YhJHFDzXLopXByc5vSGg.text: This is my favorite food spot in town.  Everything here is good from the grilled fish to the fried fish anything on the menu is amazing.  You have to try their banana pudding

CPb37EY6lqrm4ZLWxntNGw.text: Outstanding food and great service; had a cup of spicy gumbo, grilled shrimp kabobs and key lime pie but everything looked great.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gumbo and grilled shrimp kabobs

QBx3qrN-I_bbqxp9hIFxyA.text: We stopped by after reading reviews and looking at the menu. We came by on a Wednesday afternoon around 2:30 pm. There were only a couple of tables occupied but we knew they normally had a dinner rush. My husband lived in New Orleans for a while and we have eaten a decent amount of Cajun/Creole food and we are constantly on the lookout for reputable restaurants.  My son got the 2 chicken strips and it came with fries, a bag of animal cookies, and a large drink. It came in a cute little boat which satisfied my 5 year old. The chicken was crispy and had a good flavored batter, not too heavy.  My husband got the grilled rainbow trout in lemon butter with spinach and grilled squash and zucchini. He devoured it in a matter of moments. Luckily he saved me a bite and it was well seasoned and moist. The spinach and squash and zucchini seemed to have a lemon butter seasoning as well; very delicious whatever it was!  I ordered a bowl of crawfish chowder and the fried shrimp poor boy sandwich. The crawfish chowder had a wonderful kick that makes you sweat but keeps you coming back for more. It has the same heat reminiscent of NOLA gumbo, such a good burn! Most places that try to replicate the NOLA po'boy usually fall short in the bread and flavor department. If you go for bread that's too hard or crispy, or even chewy, it ruins it. If the sauce is too spicy or overpowering, no thank you. But this seriously took me back to sitting in Jackson Square, eating a shrimp po'boy under the sun. The bread was a softer alternative; the breading in the shrimp was light and crunchy. The mixture of tomato, lettuce, and whatever sauce they used was mouth watering. I had asked for no onions and noticed some were in there but I barely even noticed, it was THAT TASTY! It came with beautifully crisped French fries and two hush puppies, light corn fritters that were pleasantly put down the hatch.  We will definitely be back. Congratulations on making our list!  P.S. The fresh strawberry lemonade is absolutely divine! So refreshing and not too sweet.

TuXa4NlNAzfdgITVYHRBBA.text: Visiting Vegas for the week, we found ourselves looking a nearby place that could accomodate our group.  Called ahead to ask, and the owner went out of his way to assure they could.  We arrived to find it a small diner where you order at the counter and pick up your order when it's ready.    We came here with a group of 7 and ordered several dishes and wanted to try them all.  We ordered a lot of dishes, including:  Fried oysters Calamari Fish tacos Hushpuppies Gumbo Blackened orange roughy Butter, garlic red snapper  Listed iin order of my personal preferences.  Great food, great staff, and the owner/chef, Miguel, is a heckofa nice guy.    The staff went out of their way to accomodate our high maintenance group who wanted to eat family style and share the various dishes.  The fried oysters are awesome!  Fish tacos too.  Nothing bad in our order, although, as far as gumbo is concerned, our tastes tend to prefer a peanut butter color rioux than the darker color here.  Good bottled beer selection and a few on tap.  Standard soft drink offerings as well.  Kudos to owner for running a top notch place and food.  Fantastic and friendly staff.  Thank you.  We all left happy and well fed.

TnW3d3tnmWf9UdUtFi9ZYQ.text: Wow!  Sorry but I wouldn't have stopped at this little strip mall restaurant if not for the other reviews I found.  I'm sure glad I did.  Lots of fresh fish with several different tasty preparations.  Though many fried options are available, I particularly found the grilled and blackened varieties of salmon and sea bass well worth a repeat visit.

35Sfpo27oKzJJ1zJEi8Pww.text: I've got four words for you: soft shell crab poboy! Come here and get that, and you'll be a happy camper. Unless you have a shellfish allergy, and you probably shouldn't be here anyway. The crabs are gigantic and the legs make them look like fried spiders. Tasty, crispy, well-seasoned fried spiders. Two huge sandwich halves, with fries and hushpuppies, are well worth the $13 price tag and I'll cross town for this meal again.  But it took me a few visits to find this magical order. Previous takeout orders for fish tacos and a a grilled shrimp salad were average to mediocre, thanks to limited dressings, a deconstructed presentation, soggy tortillas, etc. The seafood soups look good too, but now that I've found success with the poboys, I'll be sticking to that part of the menu!

Was a bit on the salty side but I do have a lighter taste.   My friend got the bbq shrimp pope boy, and the sauce they use is perfect! A little spicy but amazing flavors , I would probably get that next time I come!

tITYL1ArAZ22zTbX7fgrZw.text: Place is very spacious and the food is delicious! I've been a few times and it never disappoints. It can be a little pricey though.

giVGdiLjEvbh5w3A9YUAaA.text: Fast and friendly service with a nice environment as well. The soft shell crab po boy is a must for everyone who's going to come here.

Y_h2elazZKc5JDx4pmzQ1Q.text: Ok I have had jumbalya and gumbo in New Orleans and let me tell you this is as good as it gets. The food is excellent the prices are inexpensive. My wife had the shrimp P.O. boy and it was great as well. The portions are good size not like the other over priced non tasting overly priced places in Vegas. The staff are helpful and place was super clean. Can not wait to come back and try a few more things from their menus. The only regret I have is I did not try the red beans and rice.

RBNIDWNx1-fOcebDnPHjsg.text: Great seafood at a reasonable price! We've been here a few times now and it's a great meal every time.  The ceviche is a little different than your typical ceviche. It's a tomato base, so it doesn't have that strong citrus/lime flavor.   My "go to" is the grilled orange roughy plate. It's somewhat simply prepared but the flavor is great and most important - cooked perfectly every time. The rice and zucchini/squash that accompanies the plate matches up well.  Service is quick and friendly and I always leave feeling full and satisfied. What more can you ask for? :)

Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ceviche (a little different, heavy tomato flavor, but still good)

2fxQ56dgc9ajMaGf3wgong.text: The food was hot, fresh, and well seasoned. I ordered the Bayou Basket which included catfish, shrimp, oysters, fries, and hush puppies. The serving size was plentiful, I had to ask for a to go box. After a long flight to Las Vegas, we were starving and was looking for seafood close to the airport and we were not disappointed. I highly recommend the seafood gumbo as a starter, it was delicious!

Ead0I6v1yh6fyZLSyVtWag.text: What a cool little gem! My sister came here first and fell in love with the gumbo so she said I had to come try it and she was not wrong! We both agree that it is one of the best gumbo we've tried and we tried a few. Their platter was also very good! I love that they offer soft shell crabs! The hush puppies were also really tasty, very crispy on the outside and soft on the inside filled with corn and garlic I had two and wanted more! I got the Louisiana platter and it was huge! Definitely big enough for two to share. Everything was fried perfectly and batter was not too salty.  Will definitely be coming back for other items... definitely for more gumbo.

MIz5W0L2-a5Fq0F_-QxRNQ.text: The place was clean, the staff pleasant, the food was very good. It's easy to get to, perfect to dash and go. We'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled red snapper,  beans and rice, grilled vegetables,  fried shrimp with fries and hush puppies, rounded out with gumbo, great choice!

XE_N8HAVuj_UT35pEkq3ug.text: If you're looking for some fish and chips, this is the place to go!  A short drive from the airport and the Las Vegas strip, this gem is located in Windmill Lane Plaza.  Meals cost roughly $10 and up depending on what you order.   You can do takeout or dine in.  When you dine in, they provide you with a buzzer, and you go up to the counter and get your food. The wait for the food isn't long at all which is a plus!  I had the catfish fillet basket.  Good size fish fillet.  Meal came with fries, 2 hush puppies, tartar sauce and cocktail sauce which had a good kick to it.  The catfish had a good coating of batter; not to thin/thick, but just right. Fries are either seasoned or regular.  Seasoned fries have a lil Cajun kick.  The hush puppies were about the size of a golf ball and was also good.   Hubby got the 2 piece beer battered cod which he said he liked too.  His wasn't drenched in oil and tasted just right.    Inside the restaurant is nice and bright, with a lot of light coming from the windows.  Got some cute decor hanging on the wall and two flat screen tv's with at least some sporting event on.  The tables are supplied with saltine crackers, hot sauce, ketchup, oh and salt & pepper which they got in corona bottles, (thought that was pretty cool). Near the counter they have a fridge with a selection of beer for purchase.    Staff was nice and friendly, didn't have much interaction with them, but they weren't rude or anything when we ordered.    Overall I'd definitely eat here again.  Hubby and I came here for vacay for less than a week and we ate here twice! :)

kkwoIFPlr2i5z_LHeg0HvQ.text: Love this place! Fish is always cooked perfectly, salad is always fresh, hush puppies are delicious and everyone is always friendly! If you haven't tried this spot, you're missing out!

X0mU8SvghKZ1Ed69VhhKZA.text: Very good value for seafood. Casual atmosphere. Everyone behind counter very nice. Can eat healthy or not, your choice.

QahoKGNfpKR58-naRw1QVw.text: Wow!  We ended up at this restaurant because Bachi Burger was closed last night.  We were all starving, read a few reviews on Yelp and in we went!  When we walked in my brother in law (he's so funny) asked a couple of different patrons, "how's the food?"  Each one responded w/eyes lit up and a smile, "so good, great and we love it here!"  Well, we have found a new jem in Vegas for sure!  Clean, friendly and spacious.  But the food...YUMMY & excellent!!!!  All 4 of us LOVED our dishes.  2 of us, after the owner generously offered a taste of the jambalaya, ordered that, hubby got grilled talapia plate and my sista-in-law got fish tacos.  We are actually staying a little later today JUST so we can go here for lunch before heading back to CA.  Seems like  a wonderful family owned restaurant and we love to support those business.

QSJOxIBXhbML5bVY-dbGOQ.text: What an amazing menu, chef made great choices of putting together great ingredients. If I could eat here every day I would. I love the decor and all of their food...... the frozen mugs for tap beer are amazing

ja-6begzC_YxJnChO8UaXw.text: Great fish.great prices. Cooked just right.beer and wine also.a must try for lunch or diner.you won't be sorry you tried it.

4e_La3QaxpuGK5G_Dux6pQ.text: Great little family restaurant. Hubby had snow crab and I had a combo with fried catfish & shrimp. Both were very good but catfish fillets were thin so you tasted more corneal breading than fish. Sides were generous & tasty. Will definitely be back.

e_vCjFbE7klvCCreVzO-Sw.text: Service was good . Very accommodating. Was with cousin his wife and small girls . They made sushi extra small for one if the girls! Now that's service . Also the food was soooo good from swordfish tacos and the sushi was awesome!! Definitely recommend

IQRFGeIRJzSlkop_pjktCw.text: Nice, clean place. Went for lunch, was greeted upon walking in, very welcoming. I had the catfish basket, fresh fish with a nice cornmeal crust. Plenty of food for the price, will be going back!

nR7HukDSyZqdAGGah26Vow.text: The food here is amazing, the service is amazing - I liked everyhting except like another reviewer mentioned it was a little more than I was hoping for lunch. The guys that were working there were very kind and welcoming - the restaurant itself was a little different but they did what they could with the decor and the nets and blue paint made the ocean and seafood feeling come alive, the tables and chairs left me wanting a little bit more. The food here is excellent as I already stated and really enjoy the salmon salad. The salads are  very fresh with big piecies of tomatos and cucumber along with lots of greens. Healthy food, cooked to perfection - you'll be glad you came here.

qIJ-rNBHNuade_mpOuLZog.text: Went today and ordered the fried shrimp po boy sandwich, and basket of fried catfish (spicy). Very impressed with the quality, including the homemade tarter and cocktail sauces! Wow!! Two thumbs up! Keep up the excellent good quality!

XwRmgdb1qC3QZLuLHq3XDg.text: Good affordable fish fry place.  Simple and delicious menu.  Fast service.  Not a full service restaurant.  You order at the counter and pickup your food when it is ready.

1y321J7hsJ0VYDBJaKyXVg.text: I'm from Georgia and I'm traveling through to California, when I stopped in Las Vegas for a few days. I was at the gym, when I noticed next-door, a New Orleans style restaurant. After looking at the menu, I decided to give it a try, and boy was it worth it. I got the tilapia fish tacos and my girlfriend ordered the grilled trout. The meal was absolutely amazing, with great prices, and the staff was extremely friendly. I intend to visit a few more times before I leave Vegas.

1OuuPMU81NRpVzuCMvKY-Q.text: Friend in town and he/we needed a few specific things: proximity to the Strip, grilled fish, decent atmosphere but nothing pricy or extravagant. Cue Yelp and Fish King Grill. Such a good decision.   The food is great, the prices are reasonable, the place is more spacious than I expected and definitely clean, but what really sold us is how friendly the staff is -- just truly pleasant and kind as they take your order and give you your food. Sounds small but it can be nonexistent in similar establishments.  Toward the end I thought I had left my sunglasses on the table and the woman busing the tables came outside to double check that I'd found them (I had). This is not even a sit down restaurant in the sense that you tip a waiter (you can and should tip your cashiers). So again this kind of service was unexpected and appreciated. Thanks for taking good care of my friend and me. I'll be back and bring more friends!

JgxEI4ZKRRiJ0b1OumDGzQ.text: This is awesome place, good variety of seafood and chicken as for not expensive dinner. Also they can do some customizations, like plain grilled fish with no paper. Food is very good stuff as well.

S6SGvXiv0YcEaBGyoplHag.text: Loved the crawfish chowder and hush puppies and my son's catfish and chips was tasty too. Clean atmosphere and great service.

yBQo2aR_HirnyqF06f34Vg.text: Made to order excellent and fresh. Had the grilled tilapia w butter and garlic seasoning, as well as the crawfish soup. Their seafood dishes do not disappoint on the portions you pay for. Nice background music as well :)

WzsgJYfXGTaBktivP1TqQA.text: Great casual seafood restaurant. Just opened. I ordered the soft shell crab Po Boy. Really fantastic. Wife ordered the Salmon salad. It came with a huge slab of salmon on top of the greens. She thought it was one of the best she ate. My sandwich came with fries and hush puppies. They were so good that we had to order a basket on the side. Prices were reasonable given the portions. Recommended!!

ltTQx5Rn1Q0lAJMkKMwiIQ.text: This place was unexpected, I found it when searching for some seafood for lunch. The place is still very new and clean, and the staff was very helpful. I ordered the fried catfish platter, it had a little too much breading for my taste, but it was perfectly crispy and delicious. I'm definitely making this a regular lunch spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Catfish platter with fries and hush puppies.

P3-yO5E927YlpN54d1OcLA.text: Wild Hog Poppers were good but the catfish was awesome. Reminded me of Bob's Catfish in Ada Oklahoma. Beers on tap served in a huge frosty glass. The coleslaw was the best in town. The staff was friendly and patient. Very casual atmosphere with nice Jazz music playing in background. All around the food was very good.

rIyp06aasNDF5xuzPt2opQ.text: Outstanding seafood at a fabulous price! This place really knows what they are doing with all types of seafood and everything we have ordered has been perfect. The service is excellent and the prices are really fair. They work hard to serve tasty food and keep this restaurant clean and comfortable.

h3uHL5tFrG7iThSeiqbnqg.text: If you enjoy good Louisiana cooking, you will love this place.  We had the shrimp and the oyster Poorboys and gumbo.  They were fantastic.  I can't wait to try other things on their menu.

g4SzpaDGRo-HEw7kkOCYAQ.text: Went tonight with my family for Mothers Day dinner. This is a new little place, and man is it good!  I ordered the fish tacos, with tilapia. You get 3, in hard corn shells. You also get a side of beans and rice. The tacos were very good. I am a slow eater however, and by the time I got to the 3rd taco, the fish fell out of the shell. That's okay, I ate it off of the plate. The beans were a little spicy, but super yummy.  My older daughter ordered the chicken po' boy sandwich, and said it was really tasty. She doesn't like fish, so she was happy there was a non-fish option. My son ordered the fried catfish and shrimp, and also said it was really good. His came with two hushpuppies, and he shared one with me. I used to eat hushpuppies at Long John Silvers when I was a kid, and I have to say these was even better! I will order a side for myself next time. My parents both got the fried fish as well. My youngest and my grandson shared a kids meal, cheeseburger and fries. Also glad there was a non-fish option for them. Everyone enjoyed their food. My husband wasn't able to come, so I would love to bring him back.  The decor is a cute nautical theme. Its quaint and cozy, and for it being a holiday, we were happy there was no wait in line at all. The people behind the counter were very nice. We also received a 20% discount because we are a military family, which was cool.  We will definitely be going back!

mHxKVxlpQbm2cLwXrietFQ.text: Stopped in for lunch while on vacation.  I got a bowl of gumbo and the jambalaya, and my wife got a shrimp po boy.  We also got a side of hushpuppies.  The hushpuppies were great, and my wife enjoyed her sandwich (saying the shrimp wasn't overly fried.)  I was okay with my two items, but they were in a little heavier sauce than I would have prefered (and have had other places.)  I'd like to come back and try some of the other items on the menu - definitely worth checking out if you're in the mood for Cajun food.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp PoBoy, jambalaya and gumbo

wF4l2nGwopsTK4pYW653vw.text: When we go out for fish in Vegas,  I don't expect much.  After all,  we are in the middle of the desert. Food was well prepared and very tasty.  I had grilled sea bass in lemon butter and husband had grilled orange roughly prepared veracruz style.  Grilled entrees are served worth red beans and rice and grilled vegetables.  Again, both well prepared and True to their cultural roots.   As good as Kings Fish House and far more affordable!  Well be back!

F-W2PslCAVLWCdmsGz1lLg.text: I really enjoyed this joint. Upon waking in, I noticed this establishment to be VERY clean. Customer service was superb!! All of the employees seemed to enjoy working here. All were enthusiastic and very helpful with making dinner selections.   I ordered blackened salmon with veggies; no rice and jalapeno poppers wrapped in bacon with shrimp in the middle. The veggies were zucchini and squash. Two of my favorite things to eat. The portions were good too!   I was extremely pleased with my meal. Everything was cooked and seasoned to perfection. I'm really intrigued about ordering other items off of the menu. Overall exceptional!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hWt68fnT2Ba2GmVuW-_pIA.text: Fresh delicious food, nice place, friendly staff and the cook(s) definitely knows what they're doing in the kitchen. Will be back!

6iDcGAO2OLC56VSKj6_ryg.text: Great selection of grilled fish, fried fish, Cajun food, beer!  Very large menu and the food was excellent.  Very reasonable with big portions.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Very casual but catchy decor

99qnY7nsfvIEUkZ4fMzJrw.text: Nice restaurant, good bread, extremely expensive.  I ordered blackened catfish, portion was the size of my palm, but delicious. My friend ordered the Maryland Crabcakes (not very good.) We had one cocktail each, bill was nearly $100.00 bucks. I think we may have had chowder which was ok. Go back, at those prices? No.

GOYObbnQI16jvNnVPLa9CA.text: It's a nice place and fast service. However the food is OK.

_xRs1lYACmOaa4eA983T3w.text: Amazing food and staff great experience also not bad prices my wife and I were more than satisfied by the time we left

oYp4uLOhOMTlx39EwEyy6g.text: we absolutely loved this place!! so glad we found it!!!   it is our 3rd or 4th time eating here and i cant believe im barely writing a review!!   my go to is the snow crab bucket and i ask for extra cajun seasoning on it... the hog poppers are bomb and so is the tilapia!!! staff is fast and friendly, place is always super clean and i can definitely not say enough good things about this place!! so happy its like around the corner from our house :)

fPfzN3ycCnsbRTFoVf8eLQ.text: My husband loves the farm raised catfish. I tried the grilled fish tacos tonight.. The best I've ever had!  Hush puppies are really good.

cDMPYBwEJ3oaDxpTiwDd0w.text: Eveytime I come to Vegas this is a must! I love the seafood Alfredo... I wish it was more FISH king Grills

gdhOimt-VR5-cyGi--bo5Q.text: Wow When I stepped in this restaurant they made me feel at home , Then when I got my food it was even better, quick and old fashioned home made.  Just fresh and delicious seafood, Enjoy

B63BdRA8pIT0csPOahSQFQ.text: Food is always on point. Very good freindly staff and alot of southern creole options that are good

KASuUI_1WibB8C_6dwmhhA.text: Love this place.  Great service, good food, and the best frozen margarita in town!!!  I love their snow crab legs and grilled fish tacos. There are a lot of great healthy options.  And if you're in the mood for red beans and rice, take it from a southern girl...these are the closest to grandma's you're getting West of Louisiana.

UnMxNWPRGNXen7Ri7b2eww.text: I like this spot. It reminds me of the seafood houses that I remember going to when I was growing up on the east coast.   Came in one day and saw the menu. They have a lot of variety including grilled items, fried, boiled, and a bit of everything in between. I ordered my stuff over the phone because take out is available.   Ordered the fried shrimp and catfish combo. Has a more southern style cornmeal breading. Shrimp and catfish was really good. Liked the fries, reminded me of Checkers. The sauces were fresh and bright.  Got the grilled red snapper. Not too shabby. Liked the grilled vegetables, as well as the red beans and rice. Heard they had a great soft shell crab po-boy. Will have to get it sometime. All the seafood here was pretty fresh.  This place is pretty good.  I l

CqRQOXcA7RDqLY81OOSl-w.text: My husband ordered the catfish and shrimp plate (with spice)and I ordered the fish tacos(tilapia). The fish tacos were tasty but wet. So by the time I got to the second taco the shell was a little soggy. There is a lot to eat with this order and I wasn't able to finish everything. The catfish and shrimp plate was fantastic. The fish was cooked perfectly and the seasoning was exceptional. If you haven't been to Louisiana and want to know what the food tastes like, come here.  We will be back for the fresh food! The restaurant was very clean and the staff was friendly.  Thanks Fish King....we will be back and will bring friends.

xdew7JF3M2ZeQZBzFj3jZA.text: First of all the thing that caught my eye right off the bat was how clean this place was!!! I mean you could eat off the floor..although..i still wouldn't recommend it. LOL. The guys behind the counter were very patient, respectful and knowledgeable. I order the jambalaya and it was fabulous. The smoky flavor of the sausage with the crispness of the peppers..judt the right amount of spice. The shrimp wasn't over cooked. My wife had the tilapia filet plate(blackened). Lemon peppered Zucchini and squash which was grilled. YUM. The filet was cooked well. Had a proper amount of seasoning and cooked perfect. Photos will follow..

x_YZcbaAIAQpqAQKgjm4Qw.text: Strawberry Lemonade is delish!!! We had grilled tilapia fish tacos with beans & rice. Wowzah! Packed full of flavor, and juicy flaky fish and a sauce that has a bit of a zippy tang to it. It was a bit messy, but totally worth it since they even gave me a roll of paper towels on the table. I dont like kidney beans, but I ate all mine, because they were really good!!! I highly reccomend giving this place a try, they even have a reward card for frequent visitors.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled tilapia fish tacos with beans and rice.

kw0vjCjHGGMsLzDoqhSb3A.text: A lot of good restaurants on this side of Vegas & this is definitely one of them. I love the Mahi Mahi & Seabass blackened & grill. My go to sides are the corn on the cob & green beans. I also like the fried spicy catfish when in the mood for some fried fish. Banana pudding is a must try for dessert.

XoZR3KGGt5RGPRuJFL-6Ow.text: Truly don't understand how/why this place is so bomb.    Tried it for the first time on a whim and ordered the gumbo & grits, grilled salmon, fried okra & hush puppies.    The hush puppies deserve special recognition because they are the best hush puppies I've ever had in my life.    The gumbo and grits were shockingly delicious.  The grits come fried & are a fantastic pairing to the thick & savory gumbo.  I added a bit of Louisiana to taste because I prefer mine with a kick.    I had a fear the grilled salmon would be boring but it was surprisingly perfectly cooked and seasoned.  It was served with a side of yummy vegetables which were also surprisingly perfectly cooked.   Fried okra is difficult to mess up, and this place is no different.  Very solid.    Only matter of contention is the sauce that comes with the hush puppies- in short, it is wrong.  The default sauce that comes is a very off-putting cocktail-esque sauce.  If you order the hush puppies, get a side of the garlic butter.   You'll thank me later.

BCS0BfViz15F25BWZ5nWjw.text: Omg! I feel like Vegas, and especially the Henderson area, is seriously lacking on sea food restaurants unless you're eating poke or sushi (hey, that totally counts!)  When it comes to eating seafood in a rush, it can be really difficult! Well, look no further, this place is amazing!! I already love cajun food but this place is legit! You can eat healthy, not healthy, grilled, fried, boiled, etc. They also have a great selection from salmon, snapper, cod, sea bass, trout, catfish, tilapia, and orange roughy!  This was only my first time here and I had the blackend salmon. It was absolutely delicious!!  Also, pretty casual place. This is a new favorite for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Been eating healthy lately with the help of Fish King Grill. I&#39;m always so impressed!
Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Blackened Salmon!

ngLuMRZIZrRquoDkOmMCvQ.text: Working lunch here today was great. Fried catfish & hushpuppies reminded me of home in SE TX. Crispy, hot, cornmeal crunch, perfectly fried catfish. Friendly service and prompt. Will go back for sure.

ULUx69jQkSedf67LZ9mNCQ.text: We went there in a whim when I did a Yelp search for fish restaurants and what a little jewel we found. The guy at the desk was friendly.  The prices are very fair. The menu is pretty diverse. My son got the fried catfish po boy and I got the 3 piece cod fish and chips . He loved the po boy and finished all of it. The fish and chips were some of the best I've ever had.  The lemonade was great too! We will definitely be back

qCMhoGyFatAUe5bmA3khNw.text: This a very casual restaurant where orders are taken by the cashier, executed in the kitchen and delivered to your table.  I ordered the grilled catfish Veracruz that was accompanied by grilled zucchini, beans and rice.  My wife went (almost) as healthy with the grilled farm-raised salmon salad with blue cheese dressing.  Both dishes very good and reasonably priced.

photos.caption: Photo of Fish King Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

r0bK-e6os7L7WTb3ZV8Vow.text: Very unique place. I had the grilled Sea Bass with a side of veggies and rice & beans. As expected, the quality of the fish was excellent but the sides were also extremely yummy. Their strawberry lemonade is very good too. Service was quick and as many have mention, the staff was extremely polite. I will be coming back soon to try the whole fried fish I spotted on another customer's table!

qC0eiMK1muGVo7yaqAnP_A.text: This place is off the chain! I ordered the grilled catfish with spinach. The fish was cooked with the right amount of seasoning. Hubby ordered the fried catfish and shrimp and a side of gumbo. He said it was very good- spicy the way he likes it. We topped it off with a big sized margarita with the right amount of tequila and a Bud Light draft. Our son had already eaten before we got there so he ordered the banana pudding for dessert. He said it was very good and I could tell it was cause he was licking the bowl. lol  Overall the food and service was excellent. The server even came to our table to get our empty dishes and asked how the food was. We will definitely be coming back to the King Fish Grill and highly recommend it as well.

HSubFWPj-wUIW0CPcQC-zg.text: So stumbled across this place from a referral from my boss and ordered a fried oyster basket and it came with 6 oysters 2 hush puppies and fries. I read the previous yelp reviews and got the garlic butter on the side for the fries and hush puppies and it was amazing with it. The oysters was huge! Like oysters on steroids and the flavor was good tbh, and it came with a red sauce and tartar sauce. It was really good and I enjoyed it. My partner got snow crabs and it was decent. The staff there was really nice too which I liked. The only reason I gave it 3 stars was because once I left the place my stomach was turning and I was cringing. I hope it wasn't the seafood but I was sick for the rest of the day and the next day also. And that was all I ate. I am honestly not in a rush to go back after that experience. Like I said the flavor was good but the feeling after I did not like

When I searched nearby restaurants on yelp last week this one was highly rated so I figured I would give it a try. Last night my friend and I went to check it out. She ordered the snow crab legs and grits. I ordered orange roughy plate they were all fantastic. I highly recommend checking this place out. It may become my favorite local restaurant. If you like southern food don't miss this place!
